attributes.action: Set up a petition so the government look at the costs of tax on fuel
attributes.additional_details: Because all it is doing is pushing up the cost of living. A) it’s costing companies more to get their products to the distribution centres and then from the distribution centres to the shops. B) then that pushes up the prices of cost of living for the every day person /company
attributes.background: Cut the fuel tax, so it helps people and company’s who are struggling with the cost of fuel before it sends the Country in to recession

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
